column1: Uchi////Definitely one of the best sushi restaurants in Houston to me! I came in on a Wednesday night for happy hour. It was my first time here and it was a very pleasant time even though we sat on the bar. Food and service were both great. Even though
column2: our server got our order wrong twice 1 drink (we didn't complain since they were good)
column3: and 1 small dish (we ordered the walu tempura and they brought out the walu walu). However
column4: our server didn't hestitate to tell us to keep it and brought out the right one after.
